attributes.action: War Crimes trial for Cabinet for Illeagal War in Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If as it appears the war in Iraq was not founded on the real threats posed by Iraq and its capabilities were exaggerated and that invasion was illegal then the entire Cabinet at the time should face War Crimes charges for deaths to innocent people.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
